workouts.name: Full Body Circuit
workouts.description: Complete workout for all muscle groups

exercises.name: JUMPING JACKS
exercises.instructions: Stand upright with legs together and arms at your sides. Jump up and spread your feet apart while raising your arms overhead.

exercises.name: PUSH-UPS
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Lower your body until chest nearly touches floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: SQUATS
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower down as if sitting in a chair, then return to standing.

exercises.name: PLANK
exercises.instructions: Hold your body in a straight line from head to heels, supporting yourself on forearms and toes.

workouts.name: Upper Body Strength
workouts.description: Focus on arms, chest, and shoulders

exercises.name: INCLINE PUSH-UPS
exercises.instructions: Place hands on elevated surface. Perform push-up motion with body at an incline.

exercises.name: TRICEP DIPS
exercises.instructions: Sit on edge of chair, hands gripping edge. Lower body by bending elbows, then push back up.

exercises.name: LUNGES
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.

exercises.name: GLUTE BRIDGES
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent. Lift hips up by squeezing glutes, then lower down.
